General.Name: MacroWell OMG Digital Entertainment Co Ltd
General.Description: MacroWell OMG Digital Entertainment Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development of games. The company operates game agency and third-party game platform. It is also involved in the electronic payment and other businesses. The company was formerly known as Macrowell Technology Co., Ltd. and changed its name to MacroWell OMG Digital Entertainment Co., Ltd. in August 2009. MacroWell OMG Digital Entertainment Co., Ltd. was founded in 1999 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.

4.Name: Xue Hui  Lin
4.Title: Chief Admin. Officer and Director of the Sales Department
